blocks.name: golem1
blocks.content: Lemma for Godowski's equation. (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2002.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm golem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {

  3eqtr4d(co(co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c6)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c6, c7))), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c7, c8)))), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c8)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c8, c6)))), co(co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c6, c7))), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c8)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c7, c8)))), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c6)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c8, c6)))), co(co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c6)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c7))), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s0), cin(c6, c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c7, c8)))), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c8)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c8, c6)))), co(co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c8))), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s0), cin(c6, c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c7, c8)))), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c6)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c8, c6)))), wcel(cv(s0), cst))
  3eqtr4d(co(co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c6)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c7))), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s0), cin(c6, c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c7, c8)))), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c8)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c8, c6)))), co(co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c8))), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s0), cin(c6, c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c7, c8)))), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c6)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c8, c6)))), co(co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c6)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c7))), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c8))), caddc, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cin(c6, c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c7, c8))), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c8, c6)))), co(co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c8))), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c6))), caddc, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cin(c6, c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c7, c8))), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cin(c8, c6)))), wcel(cv(s0), cst))

  addassd(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c6)), cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c7)), cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c8)), wcel(cv(s0), cst))
  addcomd(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c6)), co(cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c8))), wcel(cv(s0), cst))

  chincli(c8, c6)

  stji1i(cv(s0), c6, c7)

blocks.name: golem2
blocks.content: Lemma for Godowski's equation. (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm golem2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), cst), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cin(cin(c0, c1), c2)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c3), nat1)))
  -| wcel(c4, cch)
  -| wcel(c5, cch)
  -| wcel(c6, cch)
  -| wceq(c0, co(cfv(cort, c4), chj, cin(c4, c5)))
  -| wceq(c1, co(cfv(cort, c5), chj, cin(c5, c6)))
  -| wceq(c2, co(cfv(cort, c6), chj, cin(c6, c4)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(cfv(cort, c5), chj, cin(c5, c4)))
  -| wceq(c7, co(cfv(cort, c6), chj, cin(c6, c5)))
  -| wceq(c8, co(cfv(cort, c4), chj, cin(c4, c6)))
} = {
  syld(wcel(cv(s0), cst), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cin(cin(c0, c1), c2)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c3), nat1), wceq(co(co(cfv(cv(s0), c3), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), c8)), nat3))
  sylibd(wcel(cv(s0), cst), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cin(cin(c0, c1), c2)), nat1), wceq(co(co(cfv(cv(s0), c3), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), c8)), nat3), wceq(co(co(cfv(cv(s0), c0), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), c1)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), c2)), nat3))
  stm1add3i(cv(s0), c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltri(c0, cch, co(cfv(cort, c4), chj, cin(c4, c5)))
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c4), cin(c4, c5))
  chincli(c4, c5)
  eqeltri(c1, cch, co(cfv(cort, c5), chj, cin(c5, c6)))
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c5), cin(c5, c6))
  chincli(c5, c6)
  eqeltri(c2, cch, co(cfv(cort, c6), chj, cin(c6, c4)))
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c6), cin(c6, c4))
  chincli(c6, c4)
  eqeq1d(co(co(cfv(cv(s0), c0), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), c1)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), c2)), nat3, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), c3), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), c7)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), c8)), wcel(cv(s0), cst))
  golem1(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c7, c8, c4, c5, c6)
  stadd3i(cv(s0), c3, c7, c8)
  eqeltri(c3, cch, co(cfv(cort, c5), chj, cin(c5, c4)))
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c5), cin(c5, c4))
  choccli(c5)
  chincli(c5, c4)
  eqeltri(c7, cch, co(cfv(cort, c6), chj, cin(c6, c5)))
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c6), cin(c6, c5))
  choccli(c6)
  chincli(c6, c5)
  eqeltri(c8, cch, co(cfv(cort, c4), chj, cin(c4, c6)))
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c4), cin(c4, c6))
  choccli(c4)
  chincli(c4, c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm golem2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ States →((s0 `((c0 ⋂ c1)⋂ c2))= 1 →(s0 ` c3)= 1))
  ⊣ c4 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c5 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c6 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c0 =((_|_ ` c4)[vH](c4 ⋂ c5))
  ⊣ c1 =((_|_ ` c5)[vH](c5 ⋂ c6))
  ⊣ c2 =((_|_ ` c6)[vH](c6 ⋂ c4))
  ⊣ c3 =((_|_ ` c5)[vH](c5 ⋂ c4))
  ⊣ c7 =((_|_ ` c6)[vH](c6 ⋂ c5))
  ⊣ c8 =((_|_ ` c4)[vH](c4 ⋂ c6))
} = {
  syld(s0 ∈ States, (s0 `((c0 ⋂ c1)⋂ c2))= 1, (s0 ` c3)= 1, (((s0 ` c3)[+](s0 ` c7))[+](s0 ` c8))= 3)
  sylibd(s0 ∈ States, (s0 `((c0 ⋂ c1)⋂ c2))= 1, (((s0 ` c3)[+](s0 ` c7))[+](s0 ` c8))= 3, (((s0 ` c0)[+](s0 ` c1))[+](s0 ` c2))= 3)
  stm1add3i(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltri(c0, cch, ((_|_ ` c4)[vH](c4 ⋂ c5)))
  chjcli((_|_ ` c4), (c4 ⋂ c5))
  chincli(c4, c5)
  eqeltri(c1, cch, ((_|_ ` c5)[vH](c5 ⋂ c6)))
  chjcli((_|_ ` c5), (c5 ⋂ c6))
  chincli(c5, c6)
  eqeltri(c2, cch, ((_|_ ` c6)[vH](c6 ⋂ c4)))
  chjcli((_|_ ` c6), (c6 ⋂ c4))
  chincli(c6, c4)
  eqeq1d((((s0 ` c0)[+](s0 ` c1))[+](s0 ` c2)), nat3, (((s0 ` c3)[+](s0 ` c7))[+](s0 ` c8)), s0 ∈ States)
  golem1(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c7, c8, c4, c5, c6)
  stadd3i(s0, c3, c7, c8)
  eqeltri(c3, cch, ((_|_ ` c5)[vH](c5 ⋂ c4)))
  chjcli((_|_ ` c5), (c5 ⋂ c4))
  choccli(c5)
  chincli(c5, c4)
  eqeltri(c7, cch, ((_|_ ` c6)[vH](c6 ⋂ c5)))
  chjcli((_|_ ` c6), (c6 ⋂ c5))
  choccli(c6)
  chincli(c6, c5)
  eqeltri(c8, cch, ((_|_ ` c4)[vH](c4 ⋂ c6)))
  chjcli((_|_ ` c4), (c4 ⋂ c6))
  choccli(c4)
  chincli(c4, c6)
}

blocks.name: goeqi
blocks.content: Godowski's equation, shown here as a variant equivalent to Equation SF of [Godowski] p. 730. (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2002.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm goeqi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wss(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), c3)
  -| wcel(c4, cch)
  -| wcel(c5, cch)
  -| wcel(c6, cch)
  -| wceq(c0, co(cfv(cort, c4), chj, cin(c4, c5)))
  -| wceq(c1, co(cfv(cort, c5), chj, cin(c5, c6)))
  -| wceq(c2, co(cfv(cort, c6), chj, cin(c6, c4)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(cfv(cort, c5), chj, cin(c5, c4)))
} = {
  mprg(hs0, cst, wss(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), c3), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cin(cin(c0, c1), c2)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), c3), nat1)))
  stri(hs0, cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), c3)
  chincli(cin(c0, c1), c2)
  chincli(c0, c1)
  eqeltri(c0, cch, co(cfv(cort, c4), chj, cin(c4, c5)))
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c4), cin(c4, c5))
  choccli(c4)
  chincli(c4, c5)
  eqeltri(c1, cch, co(cfv(cort, c5), chj, cin(c5, c6)))
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c5), cin(c5, c6))
  chincli(c5, c6)
  eqeltri(c2, cch, co(cfv(cort, c6), chj, cin(c6, c4)))
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c6), cin(c6, c4))
  choccli(c6)
  chincli(c6, c4)
  eqeltri(c3, cch, co(cfv(cort, c5), chj, cin(c5, c4)))
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c5), cin(c5, c4))
  choccli(c5)
  chincli(c5, c4)
  golem2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, co(cfv(cort, c6), chj, cin(c6, c5)), co(cfv(cort, c4), chj, cin(c4, c6)))
  eqid(co(cfv(cort, c6), chj, cin(c6, c5)))
  eqid(co(cfv(cort, c4), chj, cin(c4, c6)))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm goeqi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⋂ c1)⋂ c2)⊆ c3
  ⊣ c4 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c5 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c6 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c0 =((_|_ ` c4)[vH](c4 ⋂ c5))
  ⊣ c1 =((_|_ ` c5)[vH](c5 ⋂ c6))
  ⊣ c2 =((_|_ ` c6)[vH](c6 ⋂ c4))
  ⊣ c3 =((_|_ ` c5)[vH](c5 ⋂ c4))
} = {
  mprg(hs0, cst, ((c0 ⋂ c1)⋂ c2)⊆ c3, ((hs0 `((c0 ⋂ c1)⋂ c2))= 1 →(hs0 ` c3)= 1))
  stri(hs0, ((c0 ⋂ c1)⋂ c2), c3)
  chincli((c0 ⋂ c1), c2)
  chincli(c0, c1)
  eqeltri(c0, cch, ((_|_ ` c4)[vH](c4 ⋂ c5)))
  chjcli((_|_ ` c4), (c4 ⋂ c5))
  choccli(c4)
  chincli(c4, c5)
  eqeltri(c1, cch, ((_|_ ` c5)[vH](c5 ⋂ c6)))
  chjcli((_|_ ` c5), (c5 ⋂ c6))
  chincli(c5, c6)
  eqeltri(c2, cch, ((_|_ ` c6)[vH](c6 ⋂ c4)))
  chjcli((_|_ ` c6), (c6 ⋂ c4))
  choccli(c6)
  chincli(c6, c4)
  eqeltri(c3, cch, ((_|_ ` c5)[vH](c5 ⋂ c4)))
  chjcli((_|_ ` c5), (c5 ⋂ c4))
  choccli(c5)
  chincli(c5, c4)
  golem2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, ((_|_ ` c6)[vH](c6 ⋂ c5)), ((_|_ ` c4)[vH](c4 ⋂ c6)))
  eqid(((_|_ ` c6)[vH](c6 ⋂ c5)))
  eqid(((_|_ ` c4)[vH](c4 ⋂ c6)))
  diff.hs0.c(((c0 ⋂ c1)⋂ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: stcltr1i
blocks.content: Property of a strong classical state. (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm stcltr1i(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1)), wss(c1, c2)))
  -| wb(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cst), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1)), wss(c1, c2))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  simplbiim(w0, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1)), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cst), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  mp2an(wi(wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1)), wss(c1, c2))), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch))
  rspc2v(s0, s1, c1, cch, c2, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1)), wss(c1, c2)), wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(c1, cv(s1))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(c1, cv(s1)))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1))
  fveqeq2(cv(s0), c1, c0, nat1)
  sseq1(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(c1, cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1)), wss(c1, c2))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1))
  fveqeq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, nat1)
  sseq2(cv(s1), c2, c1)
  diff.cch.s(s0)
  diff.cch.s(s1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(c1, cv(s1)))
  diff.wi.s(s0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(c0, c1), nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(s1))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1)), wss(c1, c2))
  diff.wi.s(s1, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cfv(c0, c1), nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cfv(c0, c2), nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: stcltr2i
blocks.content: Property of a strong classical state. (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm stcltr2i(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(c1, chba)))
  -| wb(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cst), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl6ibr(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(c1, chba), wss(chba, c1))
  syl5(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wss(chba, c1), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, chba), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1)))
  ax-1(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, chba), nat1))
  stcltr1i(s0, s1, c0, chba, c1, w0)
  helch()
  mpbiran(wceq(c1, chba), wss(chba, c1), wss(c1, chba))
  chssii(c1)
  eqss(c1, chba)
  diff.chba.s(s0)
  diff.chba.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm stcltr2i(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ` c1)= 1 → c1 = ~H))
  ⊣ (w0 ↔(c0 ∈ States ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ CH, ∀(s1 ∈ CH,(((c0 ` s0)= 1 →(c0 ` s1)= 1)→ s0 ⊆ s1)))))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl6ibr(w0, (c0 ` c1)= 1, c1 = ~H, ~H ⊆ c1)
  syl5(w0, (c0 ` c1)= 1, ~H ⊆ c1, ((c0 ` ~H)= 1 →(c0 ` c1)= 1))
  ax-1((c0 ` c1)= 1, (c0 ` ~H)= 1)
  stcltr1i(s0, s1, c0, chba, c1, w0)
  helch()
  mpbiran(c1 = ~H, ~H ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ ~H)
  chssii(c1)
  eqss(c1, chba)
  diff.chba.s(s0)
  diff.chba.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: stcltrlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for strong classical state theorem. (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm stcltrlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cfv(cort, c2), chj, cin(c2, c1))), nat1)))
  -| wb(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cst), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cfv(cort, c2), chj, cin(c2, c1))), nat1))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cfv(cort, c2), chj, cin(c2, c1))), nat1))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  ex(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cfv(cort, c2), chj, cin(c2, c1))), nat1))
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, co(cfv(cort, c2), chj, cin(c2, c1))), nat1, co(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, cin(c2, c1))), wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cfv(cort, c2), chj, cin(c2, c1))), co(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, cin(c2, c1)))))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cfv(cort, c2), chj, cin(c2, c1))), co(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, cin(c2, c1)))), wcel(c0, cst))
  stji1i(c0, c2, c1)
  eqtrd(co(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, cin(c2, c1))), nat1, co(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1)))
  oveq2d(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, cin(c2, c1)), cfv(c0, c2), wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1)))
  fveq2d(c0, cin(c2, c1), c2, wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1)))
  syl(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1)), wceq(cin(c2, c1), c2), wceq(c1, chba))
  imp(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(c1, chba))
  stcltr2i(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  syl6eq(cin(c2, c1), c2, cin(c2, chba), wceq(c1, chba))
  ineq2(c1, chba, c2)
  chm1i(c2)
  syl(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1)), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), nat1), wcel(c0, cst))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wcel(c0, cst))
  simplbi(w0, wcel(c0, cst), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), nat1, co(cfv(c0, c2), caddc, cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2))), wcel(c0, cst))
  addcomd(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), cfv(c0, c2), wcel(c0, cst))
  recnd(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), wcel(c0, cst))
  mpi(wcel(c0, cst), wcel(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), cr), wcel(cfv(cort, c2), cch))
  choccli(c2)
  stcl(c0, cfv(cort, c2))
  recnd(cfv(c0, c2), wcel(c0, cst))
  mpi(wcel(c0, cst), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cr), wcel(c2, cch))
  stcl(c0, c2)
  sto1i(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: stcltrlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for strong classical state theorem. (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm stcltrlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(c1, c0))))
  -| wb(w0, wa(wcel(c2, cst), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), nat1)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wss(c0, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(c1, c0))), wi(wceq(cfv(c2, c0), nat1), wceq(cfv(c2, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(c1, c0))), nat1)))
  stcltrlem1(s0, s1, c2, c0, c1, w0)
  stcltr1i(s0, s1, c2, c0, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(c1, c0)), w0)
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c1), cin(c1, c0))
  choccli(c1)
  chincli(c1, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(c1, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cort, c1)
  diff.cort.s(s0)
  diff.chj.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(c1, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cort, c1)
  diff.cort.s(s1)
  diff.chj.s(s1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, c1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm stcltrlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆((_|_ ` c1)[vH](c1 ⋂ c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 ↔(c2 ∈ States ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ CH, ∀(s1 ∈ CH,(((c2 ` s0)= 1 →(c2 ` s1)= 1)→ s0 ⊆ s1)))))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  mpd(w0, c0 ⊆((_|_ ` c1)[vH](c1 ⋂ c0)), ((c2 ` c0)= 1 →(c2 `((_|_ ` c1)[vH](c1 ⋂ c0)))= 1))
  stcltrlem1(s0, s1, c2, c0, c1, w0)
  stcltr1i(s0, s1, c2, c0, ((_|_ ` c1)[vH](c1 ⋂ c0)), w0)
  chjcli((_|_ ` c1), (c1 ⋂ c0))
  choccli(c1)
  chincli(c1, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, (_|_ ` c1), chj, (c1 ⋂ c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cort, c1)
  diff.cort.s(s0)
  diff.chj.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, (_|_ ` c1), chj, (c1 ⋂ c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cort, c1)
  diff.cort.s(s1)
  diff.chj.s(s1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: stcltrthi
blocks.content: Theorem for classically strong set of states. If there exists a "classically strong set of states" on lattice ` CH ` (or actually any ortholattice, which would have an identical proof), then any two elements of the lattice commute, i.e., the lattice is distributive. (Proof due to Mladen Pavicic.) Theorem 3.3 of [MegPav2000] p. 2344. (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm stcltrthi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(c0, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(c1, c0)))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wrex(s0, cst, wral(s1, cch, wral(s2, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), nat1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  ax-mp(wss(c0, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(c1, c0))), wrex(s0, cst, wral(s1, cch, wral(s2, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), nat1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  rexlimiva(s0, cst, wral(s1, cch, wral(s2, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), nat1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wss(c0, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(c1, c0))))
  stcltrlem2(s1, s2, c0, c1, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cst), wral(s1, cch, wral(s2, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), nat1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  biid(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cst), wral(s1, cch, wral(s2, cch, wi(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), nat1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(c1, c0)))
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(c1, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cort, c1)
  diff.cort.s(s0)
  diff.chj.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm stcltrthi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ c0 ⊆((_|_ ` c1)[vH](c1 ⋂ c0))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ ∃(s0 ∈ States, ∀(s1 ∈ CH, ∀(s2 ∈ CH,(((s0 ` s1)= 1 →(s0 ` s2)= 1)→ s1 ⊆ s2))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  ax-mp(c0 ⊆((_|_ ` c1)[vH](c1 ⋂ c0)), ∃(s0 ∈ States, ∀(s1 ∈ CH, ∀(s2 ∈ CH,(((s0 ` s1)= 1 →(s0 ` s2)= 1)→ s1 ⊆ s2)))))
  rexlimiva(s0, cst, ∀(s1 ∈ CH, ∀(s2 ∈ CH,(((s0 ` s1)= 1 →(s0 ` s2)= 1)→ s1 ⊆ s2))), c0 ⊆((_|_ ` c1)[vH](c1 ⋂ c0)))
  stcltrlem2(s1, s2, c0, c1, s0, (s0 ∈ States ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ CH, ∀(s2 ∈ CH,(((s0 ` s1)= 1 →(s0 ` s2)= 1)→ s1 ⊆ s2)))))
  biid((s0 ∈ States ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ CH, ∀(s2 ∈ CH,(((s0 ` s1)= 1 →(s0 ` s2)= 1)→ s1 ⊆ s2)))))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, ((_|_ ` c1)[vH](c1 ⋂ c0)))
  diff.co.s(s0, (_|_ ` c1), chj, (c1 ⋂ c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cort, c1)
  diff.cort.s(s0)
  diff.chj.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}
